channel.title: Drydock Talk with the TSG
channel.description: Unnecessary commentary about the Space Center by two guys who questionably know what they're talking about.
channel.itunes:author: TSG @ Drydock Talk
channel.itunes:subtitle: Unnecessary commentary about the Space Center by two guys who questionably know what they're talking about.
channel.itunes:summary: Unnecessary commentary about the Space Center by two space guys who questionably know what they're talking about. We love talking about everything Space Center, including stories from members of the Space Center, Technology and Theory.

item.title: Drydock Talk Episode 00 - Who are these guys?
item.description: Welcome to our 1st release! Today are introducing ourselves, and talking about the Christa McAullife Space Education Center.

item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to our 1st release! Today are introducing ourselves, and talking about the Christa McAullife Space Education Center.

item.title: Drydock Talk Episode 01 - Bossman Himself
item.description: Welcome to our first interview! Today will be an interview with Victor Williamson, creator and founder of the Christa McAullife Space Education Center.
